name: David Muller
text: The new beyond meat pizza is fantastic.   Been vegetarian for a while but cheese pizza gets boring.  Cant tell its not real sausage. Pizza full of flavor.  Finally!

name: LunaOfTheDarkestNight
text: Ordered a pizza online from here last night with Garlic sauce, pineapple, Spinich, chicken and olives. The same thing we order every time. For $47.98. it was the worst pizza that we've ever had. It was bland, very little toppings and the â€¦More

text: Expensive for consistently doughy pizza. The last few times I have ordered from this location this is the issue every time. This time we got a large Hawaiian and a large Supreme both were not fully cooked. We also ordered bread sticks and â€¦More

name: Allie VanSmith
text: Pizza was way over priced. I wouldn't have agreed to pay $26 for a large pizza if I knew it was going to be that terrible. Do not recommend!

name: Devon Simpson
text: I ordered from Pizza Hut tonight for the first time in probably 6 months, and I have to say, they are terrible. They continue to give you less for more cash and their customer service isn't anything impressive. I suggest looking at ordering from other companies who don't leave you feeling cheated. My personal favorite is Papa Murphy's.

name: Kim Pence
text: I love pizza hut!! Great pizza, fast service at the counter, order ahead or delivery. A long time favorite of mine. Great employees too.

name: Jc
text: If you're in central point and you want a good pizza don't go to this Pizza Hut. The staff was rude the pizza was awful and if I could give no stars that's what it would be.  There were several people working behind the counter and they were more interested in arguing amongst themselves than taking care the customers.

name: Rachy Ray4
text: Whenever I visit my grandma in Central Point I usually like to order here and we have had really good service and the pizza was always delicious. Today was a little off. The woman who I was on the phone kinda irritated me. I told her my â€¦More

text: Delivered wrong pizza called to ask about it , I was nice. But girl on phone was rude and said you ordered it online. I didn't and when I told her that she goes ow my manager took that order im like ok i got wrong pizza and she hung up no sorry not a way to treat people that pay for you to have a job. Wish I didnt tip....

name: Georgie Bell
text: Good pizza. Not bad price. Good service.

name: Park Patrick
text: Order a stuffed crust pizza, once I arrived I paid for the pizza. After paying for the pizza I checked it out, it was undercooked and doughy. I asked for it to be cooked longer, after two minutes they gave it back to me, still under cooked. â€¦More

name: Isaac Kain
text: Forgot  my sace

name: Gaming guys
text: Associates are great always smiling. I am a regular at the Central Point Pizza Hut. I give it 3 stars because it is so hot in the store. I can't understand how a big business like Pizza Hut could let their employees work in such harsh conditions. IT IS WRONG!

name: kim dion
text: We were camping at Southern Oregon RV park and ordered pizza with the time given of 30 minutes. I chuckled because the fair was going on and not only did I expect an hour but the pizza to be only warm. But within 30 minutes the pizza was not only here but hot as well . WTG Pizza Hut great service!

name: Betty Czech
text: Very dirty wont ever go there and no reason to be also had to wait for some one to come out from the back i was the only person thete no reason for such filth

text: First time I have ever been disappointed with Pizza Huts Brownies...Bottom was hard and it was very very dry like as if it was cooked twice...

name: MARY Waller
text: Always good but help was slow with only one person able to do register.

name: Packer
text: It's perfect! It was a  Frankenstein of the pizza but it's exactly what I ordered and I am absolutely in love with it and Pizza Hut definitely makes a better spinach chicken Alfredo with balsamic vinaigrette pizza then Papa John's or any of the other local pizzerias in the area for sure!!!

name: David Gray
text: Crappy low cost main stream pizza. One step above true junk food.

text: The pizza was not edible.  I am pretty lenient and not picky about pizza, but the one time I stopped here to pick up a pepperoni with stuffed crust, it was horrible.  I even complained to corporate.
